sense.def:
The pace of something
je hitrost, s katero se nekaj dogaja.

seg.quote: The sale resumed at a brisk pace.

sense.def:
One's pace
je hitrost, s katero nekdo hodi.

seg.quote: He proceeds at a leisurely pace.

sense.def:
A pace
je razdalja, za katero se premaknemo, ko naredimo en korak.

seg.quote: He took two quick paces forward.
He stopped when he was a few paces away.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
paces up and down
, hodi sem ter tja, ker je nervozen ali nestrpen.

seg.quote: Harold paced nervously up and down the platform.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
keeps pace with something
, se hitro spreminja v odziv na tisto, kar se spreminja.

seg.quote: Earnings have not kept pace with inflation.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo nekaj naredi
at one's own pace
, tisto naredi tako hitro, kot mu najbolj ustreza.
